trans-unit.source: Provides a property and a method for accessing the computer's serial ports.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性和方法，以存取電腦的序列連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Ports` object provides a straightforward entry point for accessing the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] serial port class, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Ports`物件來存取提供簡單的進入點[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]序列連接埠類別<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports`物件。

trans-unit.source: Dial a modem attached to a serial port
trans-unit.target: 撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠

trans-unit.source: [How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.source: Send a string to a serial port
Receive strings from a serial port
trans-unit.target: 接收來自序列埠的字串
[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.source: This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。

trans-unit.source: All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> method sends the data to the serial port.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Ports" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Ports" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates and opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立及開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Name of the port to open.
Creates and opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立及開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An open <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object, configured with the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 開放式 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件，使用提供的引數進行設定。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 引數`OpenSerialPort`方法會決定的設定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件。

trans-unit.source: Your code should close the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object when it is finished using the object.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼應該關閉<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件完成時使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法，明確關閉該物件或`Using`陳述式來以隱含方式關閉它。

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，本主題中的範例，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法。

trans-unit.source: Dial a modem attached to a serial port
trans-unit.target: 撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠

trans-unit.source: [How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.target: 接收來自序列埠的字串
[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.source: This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。

trans-unit.source: All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> method sends the data to the serial port.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="portName" /> is <see langword="Nothing" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="portName" /> 為 <see langword="Nothing" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: Name of the port to open.

trans-unit.target: 連接埠的傳輸速率 (Baud Rate)。

trans-unit.source: Creates and opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立及開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An open <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object, configured with the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 開放式 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件，使用提供的引數進行設定。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 引數`OpenSerialPort`方法會決定的設定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件。

trans-unit.source: Your code should close the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object when it is finished using the object.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼應該關閉<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件完成時使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法，明確關閉該物件或`Using`陳述式來以隱含方式關閉它。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort`方法。

trans-unit.source: Dial a modem attached to a serial port
trans-unit.target: 撥號數據機連接到序列連接埠

trans-unit.source: [How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：撥接與序列埠連接的數據機](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.source: Send a string to serial port
Receive strings from a serial port
trans-unit.target: 接收來自序列埠的字串
[如何：接收來自序列埠的字串](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)

trans-unit.source: This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例說明如何將字串傳送至電腦的`COM1`序列連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: `Using` 區塊允許應用程式即使產生例外狀況，也可關閉序列埠。

trans-unit.source: All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料序列埠的所有程式碼應該會出現在這個區塊中，或在`Try...Catch...Finally`區塊呼叫使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> method sends the data to the serial port.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> 方法會將資料傳送至序列埠。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將字串傳送至序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="portName" /> is <see langword="Nothing" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="portName" /> 為 <see langword="Nothing" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataBits" /> is less than or equal to zero.
<paramref name="stopBits" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.StopBits" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stopBits" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.StopBits" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦上序列埠名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 電腦上序列埠的名稱集合。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames`屬性會取得電腦上的序列埠名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The port names returned by `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` may be incorrect when run on Windows 98.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 上執行時，`My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 所傳回的序列埠名稱可能不正確。

trans-unit.source: To prevent application errors, use exception handling, such as the `Try...Catch...Finally` statement or the `Using` statement, when using the port names to open ports.
trans-unit.target: 為了避免應用程式錯誤，請在使用序列埠名稱開啟序列埠時，使用例外狀況處理，例如 `Try...Catch...Finally` 陳述式或 `Using` 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames`屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example loops over all the strings that the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property returns.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會針對 `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 屬性傳回的所有字串執行迴圈。

trans-unit.source: These strings are the names of the available serial ports on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 這些字串是電腦上可用序列埠的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a user selects which serial port the application should use from the list of available ports.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，使用者會從可用的序列埠清單中，選取應用程式應該使用的序列埠。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the serial port names are stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，序列埠名稱會儲存在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> 控制項中。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ListBox 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/listbox-control-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: That your form have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 您的表單會有名為 `ListBox1` 的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：顯示可用的序列埠](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)。
